<br>
<br>

This report presents an analysis of the distribution of samples across geographical locations, stratified by species, providing insights into sampling coverage and spatial patterns.
<br>

  source data: <b><u>`r  robj$freq.parms["freq.label_data"] `</u> </b>

  uid level: <b><u>`r robj$freq.parms["freq.uid_level"] `</u> </b>
  
  cuttoff year: <b><u>`r robj$freq.parms["freq.cutoff_year"] `</u> </b>
  
  Spatial resolution: <b><u>`r robj$freq.parms$freq.geo_resolution[1] `</u> </b> degree (longitude); <b><u>
  `r robj$freq.parms$freq.geo_resolution[2] `</u> </b> (latitude)
